effect.description_zh: Tooltip 主题，Element Plus 内置了 dark / light 两种主题

content.description: The displayed content can also be passed into the DOM via a 'slot'
content.description_zh: 显示的内容，也可以通过 `slot` 传入 DOM

value.description: Whether the status is visible or not

:v-model.description: Whether the status is visible or not

offset.description: The offset of the occurrence position

show-arrow.description: Whether a tooltip arrow is displayed or not. For more info, please refer to [ElPopper](https://github.com/element-plus/element-plus/tree/dev/packages/components/popper)
show-arrow.description_zh: 是否显示 Tooltip 箭头， 欲了解更多信息，请参考 ElPopper

visible-arrow.description: Whether or not to display the Tooltip arrow, more parameters can be seen in [vue-popper](https://github.com/element-component/vue-popper)
visible-arrow.description_zh: 是否显示 Tooltip 箭头，更多参数可见[Vue-popper](https://github.com/element-component/vue-popper)

popper-class.description: Add a class name for the popper

popper-style.description_zh: 为 popper 自定义样式

show-after.description_zh: 在触发后多久显示内容，单位毫秒

auto-close.description: Timeout in milliseconds to hide tooltip
auto-close.description_zh: tooltip 出现后自动隐藏延时，单位毫秒

open-delay.description: The display delay in milliseconds when the trigger mode is Hover
open-delay.description_zh: 触发方式为 hover 时的显示延迟，单位为毫秒

:close-delay.description: Hidden delay in milliseconds when triggered by hover
:close-delay.description_zh: 触发方式为 hover 时的隐藏延迟，单位为毫秒

teleported.description: Whether popover dropdown is teleported to the body
teleported.description_zh: 是否将 popover 的下拉列表插入至 body 元素

persistent.description: When popover inactive and `persistent` is `false` , popover will be destroyed
persistent.description_zh: 当 popover 组件长时间不触发且 persistent 属性设置为 false 时, popover 将会被删除

events.name: before-enter
events.description: Triggers when the entering transition before

events.name: after-enter
events.description: Triggered when the display animation finishes playing
events.description_zh: 显示动画播放完毕后触发

events.name: before-leave
events.description: Triggers when the leaving transition before

events.name: after-leave
events.description: Triggers when the hidden animation finishes playing
events.description_zh: 隐藏动画播放完毕后触发

slots.name: reference
slots.description: The HTML element that triggers the popover display
slots.description_zh: 触发 Popover 显示的 HTML 元素
